content: There's a tendsto_nhds in metric_space/basic.lean and a tendsto_nhds in topology/basic.lean. I'm working with a metric space. When I do rw tendsto_nhds, it performs the topology rewrite, but I want it to do the metric space one. Is there a way to choose? This seems like a scope issue.
Oh great thanks, I was trying metric_space.tendsto_nhds without looking at what the namespace is called!
